Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
This class is a wrapper for a grid of Tiles (that is, a 2d array of Tiles) with some useful methods.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Board()
    Initializes a newly created Board so that it is empty
    Board​(java.util.List<RemoteView> remoteViews)
    Initializes a newly created Board so that it it is empty and registers the specified remoteViews as observers

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Tile getPerimetralNext​(Tile current, boolean clockwise)
    Given a perimetral Tile on this board, this method returns the perimetral Tile that follows it in CW or CCW order, depending on the boolean passed as second argument
    Tile getPerimetralPrevious​(Tile current, boolean clockwise)
    Given a perimetral Tile on this board, this method returns the perimetral Tile that precedes it in CW or CCW order, depending on the boolean passed as second argument
    Tile getStraightBackwardsTile​(int chargerRow, int chargerCol, int targetRow, int targetCol)
    Gets the Tile on this Board that is immediately behind the specified target tile and opposite to the specified charger tile.
    Tile getStraightBackwardsTile​(Position chargerPos, Position targetPos)
    Gets the Tile on this Board that is immediately behind the specified target tile and opposite to the specified charger tile.
    java.util.List<Tile> getSurroundingTiles​(int row, int col)
    Gets a list of all the Tiles on this Board that surround the Tile at the specified row and column index.
    java.util.List<Tile> getSurroundingTiles​(Position pos)
    Gets a list of all the Tiles on this Board that surround the Tile at the specified Position.
    Tile getTile​(int row, int col)
    Returns the Tile specified by the coordinates
    Tile getTile​(Position pos)
    Returns the Tile specified by the coordinates
    void registerObserversOnTiles​(java.util.List<? extends Observer> observersList)  
    void setTile​(Tile t)
    Substitute a tile of this board

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      Initializes a newly created Board so that it is empty

      public Board​(java.util.List<RemoteView> remoteViews)
      Initializes a newly created Board so that it it is empty and registers the specified remoteViews as observers

  • Method Details

    • registerObserversOnTiles

      public void registerObserversOnTiles​(java.util.List<? extends Observer> observersList)

    • getTile

      public Tile getTile​(int row, int col)
      Returns the Tile specified by the coordinates
      Parameters:
      row - The row index of the Tile to return
      col - The column index of the Tile to return
      Returns:
      The Tile in position (row,col) on this Board, null if an invalid (i.e., out-of-bounds) row or column index is provided

    • getTile

      public Tile getTile​(Position pos)
      Returns the Tile specified by the coordinates
      Parameters:
      pos - The position on this Board of the Tile to return
      Returns:
      The Tile at the specified Position on this Board, null if an invalid (i.e., out-of-bounds) or null position is provided

    • setTile

      public void setTile​(Tile t)
      Substitute a tile of this board
      Parameters:
      t - The substitute Tile

    • getSurroundingTiles

      public java.util.List<Tile> getSurroundingTiles​(int row, int col)
      Gets a list of all the Tiles on this Board that surround the Tile at the specified row and column index. The list returned can contain up to 8 Tiles
      Parameters:
      row - The row index of the Tile whose surrounding Tiles have to be returned
      col - The column index of the Tile whose surrounding Tiles have to be returned
      Returns:
      The list of Tiles surrounding the Tile at the specified row and column index on the Board, null if an invalid (i.e., out-of-bounds) row or column index is provided

    • getSurroundingTiles

      public java.util.List<Tile> getSurroundingTiles​(Position pos)
      Gets a list of all the Tiles on this Board that surround the Tile at the specified Position. The list returned can contain up to 8 Tiles
      Parameters:
      pos - The position on this Board of the Tile whose surrounding Tiles have to be returned
      Returns:
      The list of Tiles surrounding the Tile at the specified position on the Board, null if an invalid (i.e., out-of-bounds) or null position is provided

    • getStraightBackwardsTile

      public Tile getStraightBackwardsTile​(int chargerRow, int chargerCol, int targetRow, int targetCol)
      Gets the Tile on this Board that is immediately behind the specified target tile and opposite to the specified charger tile. This method is particularly useful for managing the Minotaur GodPower
      Parameters:
      chargerRow - The row index of the charger tile
      chargerCol - The column index of the charger tile
      targetRow - The row index of the target tile
      targetCol - The column index of the target tile
      Returns:
      The Tile on this Board that is immediately behind the specified target tile and opposite to the specified charger tile, null if an invalid (i.e., out-of-bounds) row or column index is provided or if the specified charger and target tiles are not adjacent

    • getStraightBackwardsTile

      public Tile getStraightBackwardsTile​(Position chargerPos, Position targetPos)
      Gets the Tile on this Board that is immediately behind the specified target tile and opposite to the specified charger tile. This method is particularly useful for managing the Minotaur GodPower
      Parameters:
      chargerPos - The position on this Board of the charger tile
      targetPos - The position on this Board of the target tile
      Returns:
      The Tile on this Board that is immediately behind the specified target tile and opposite to the specified charger tile, null if an invalid (i.e., out-of-bounds) or null position is provided or if the specified charger and target tiles are not adjacent

    • getPerimetralNext

      public Tile getPerimetralNext​(Tile current, boolean clockwise)
      Given a perimetral Tile on this board, this method returns the perimetral Tile that follows it in CW or CCW order, depending on the boolean passed as second argument
      Parameters:
      current - The origin tile
      clockwise - The rotation sense
      Returns:
      The next Tile on the perimeter following clockwise/counter-clockwise order

    • getPerimetralPrevious

      public Tile getPerimetralPrevious​(Tile current, boolean clockwise)
      Given a perimetral Tile on this board, this method returns the perimetral Tile that precedes it in CW or CCW order, depending on the boolean passed as second argument
      Parameters:
      current - The origin tile
      clockwise - The rotation sense
      Returns:
      The previous Tile on the perimeter following clockwise/anti-clockwise order
